headline: Analog Devices (NasdaqGS:ADI) Showcases Breakthrough 6G FR3 Technology At Mobile World Congress 2025
summary: Analog Devices (NasdaqGS:ADI) experienced key developments in recent weeks that might have influenced its 7.85% price increase over the past month. On March 3, the company announced a collaboration with Keysight Technologies to advance 6G FR3 technology, potentially enhancing its market appeal. Despite reporting lower Q1 earnings on February 19, which included a dip in both sales and net income compared to the prior year, Analog Devices' prospects were strengthened by a revised buyback plan,...
